member.summary: Gets the last time when the device was fully charged.

member.summary: Sorts the order type of battery statistics.

member.name: F:Tizen.Context.AppHistory.BatteryStatistics.SortOrderType.ConsumptionMost
member.summary: Sorts the apps by consumption, the most battery consuming apps appear first (default).

member.name: F:Tizen.Context.AppHistory.UsageStatistics.SortOrderType.LastLaunchTimeNewest
member.summary: Sorts the apps by the last launch time, the most recently launched apps appear first (default).

member.summary: Sorts the apps by the launch count of being launched, the most frequently launched apps appear first.
